医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
饮用啤酒会改变红细胞脂质成分适量摄入酒精和不含酒精的啤酒会导致红细胞膜脂质成分发生轻微变化，但不会影响膜的流动性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241021/Beer-conspiration-alters-red-blood-cell-lipid-composition.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241021/Beer-conspiration-alters-red-blood-cell-lipid-composition.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6ec6218f-07f6-4456-90b9-ce75911d78a8 Mon, 21 Oct 2024 22:04:00 -0400 Beer consumption alters red blood cell lipid composition
负担能力和供应对于长效艾滋病毒药物的成功仍然至关重要全球卫生专家表示，可负担性和大规模分发对于长效注射艾滋病毒预防药物的成功至关重要，该药物已在人体试验中证明非常有效。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241021/Affordability-and-supply-remain-critical-to-the-success-of-long- permanent-HIV-drug.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241021/Affordability-and-supply-remain-critical-to-the-success-of-long- permanent-HIV-drug.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f223979f-002d-4a99-85fd-762b2e2db905 Mon, 21 Oct 2024 21:36:00 -0400 Affordability and supply remain critical to the success of long-lasting HIV drug
撒哈拉以南非洲地区哮喘发病率上升与城市化和缺乏护理有关伦敦玛丽女王大学的研究表明，撒哈拉以南非洲地区的快速城市化和人口增长增加了年轻人哮喘的发病率，但缺乏诊断和护理意味着许多年轻人患有未经治疗的哮喘症状。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241021/Rising-asthma-rates-in-sub-Saharan-Africa-linked-to-urbanization-and-lack-of-care.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241021/Rising-asthma-rates-in-sub-Saharan-Africa-linked-to-urbanization-and-lack-of-care.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e696add1-49e5-429e-b593-12454d323c58 Mon, 21 Oct 2024 21:29:14 -0400 Rising asthma rates in sub-Saharan Africa linked to urbanization and lack of care
新的 CAR T 细胞为实体瘤提供可控治疗路德维希癌症研究中心的科学家们设计出了新型嵌合抗原受体 (CAR) T 细胞——一种癌症免疫疗法——可以以不同程度的强度开启，然后根据现有药物的需要关闭。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241021/New-CAR-T-cells-offer-control-treatment-for-solid-tumors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241021/New-CAR-T-cells-offer-control-treatment-for-solid-tumors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=00a0fe89-dd75-4024-9f08-42afef3847ea Mon, 21 Oct 2024 21:21:20 -0400 New CAR T cells offer controlled treatment for solid tumors
家庭脑刺激显示出治疗抑郁症的希望UTHealth 休斯顿研究人员的一项新研究发现，一种直接刺激大脑的设备是在家治疗抑郁症的安全有效的方法；伦敦国王学院精神病学、心理学和神经科学研究所；和东伦敦大学。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241021/Home-based-brain-stimulation-shows-promise-in-treating-depression.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241021/Home-based-brain-stimulation-shows-promise-in-treating-depression.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5f6f44e8-f532-43bc-ad1a-23cedeb8244e Mon, 21 Oct 2024 21:17:22 -0400 Home-based brain stimulation shows promise in treating depression
新的光激活技术增强免疫细胞靶向实体瘤的能力调动患者自身免疫系统来对抗癌症的免疫疗法已成为治疗支柱。这些疗法，包括 CAR T 细胞疗法，在白血病和淋巴瘤等癌症中表现良好，但在实体瘤中的结果却不太乐观。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241021/New-light-activated-technology-enhances-immune-cells-ability-to-target-solid-tumors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241021/New-light-activated-technology-enhances-immune-cells-ability-to-target-solid-tumors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2e5849ed-0696-407a-8f10-07778e597c2b Mon, 21 Oct 2024 21:13:00 -0400 New light-activated technology enhances immune cells' ability to target solid tumors
研究表明癌细胞利用核糖体逃避免疫检测我们细胞的蛋白质工厂比我们想象的要多样化得多。荷兰癌症研究所的科学家现已证明，癌细胞可以利用这些所谓的核糖体来增强它们的隐形斗篷，帮助它们躲避免疫系统。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241021/Cancer-cells-use-ribosomes-to-evade-immune-detection-study-shows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241021/Cancer-cells-use-ribosomes-to-evade-immune-detection-study-shows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=19eb7ead-1534-4706-b975-3583af279460 Mon, 21 Oct 2024 20:54:30 -0400 Cancer cells use ribosomes to evade immune detection, study shows
早期结直肠癌筛查可以使年轻人受益更新后的国家结直肠癌筛查指南建议从 45 岁开始筛查；而不是 50 -；凯撒医疗机构的一项新研究发现，可以使年轻人受益。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241021/Earlier-colorectal-cancer-screening-can-benefit-younger-adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241021/Earlier-colorectal-cancer-screening-can-benefit-younger-adults.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9d9db52c-4fb4-4062-8df0-a6f9a65dcb78 Mon, 21 Oct 2024 20:49:45 -0400 Earlier colorectal cancer screening can benefit younger adults
含糖饮料税促进低收入消费者更健康的选择美国有八个城市对含糖饮料征税，这会导致肥胖和 2 型糖尿病等健康问题。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241021/Sugar-sweetened-beverage-taxes-promote-healthier-choices-for-low-venue-consumers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241021/Sugar-sweetened-beverage-taxes-promote-healthier-choices-for-low-venue-consumers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=217500f0-574d-4860-ae49-b97e737cb833 Mon, 21 Oct 2024 20:40:00 -0400 Sugar-sweetened beverage taxes promote healthier choices for low-income consumers
黑人患者在冠状动脉旁路移植术后面临更高的风险2024 年麻醉学年会上发表的一项针对超过 100 万患者的研究显示，尽管心血管医学取得了进步，但黑人患者在冠状动脉旁路移植 (CABG) 手术后在医院死亡的可能性比白人患者高 22%。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241021/Black-病人-face-higher-risks-following-coronary-artery-bypass-grafting.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241021/Black-病人-face-higher-risks-following-coronary-artery-bypass-grafting.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f4e8b259-35d3-4846-bb88-b932e5483748 Mon, 21 Oct 2024 20:34:18 -0400 Black patients face higher risks following coronary artery bypass grafting
